Leapeetswe (Papi) Rapula Radiala Molotsane bụ a South African na-azụ ahịa.
O jere ozi na Board na dị ka onye isi oche nke Telkom (South Africa) si September 2005 ka August 2008
Tupu isonyere Telkom, ọ bụ otu onyeisi nke Transnet si February 2003 August 2005 na onye isi oche nke Fedics si Jenụwarị 1999 ka Jenụwarị 2003
Ọ na-arụrụ ọrụ ka a njikwa na Nampak akpa.
Molotsane Umuihe a director nke Vodacom
Ọ bụ ugbu a a director nke South Africa si America Cup Challenge,  a director nke Fike Investment (Pty) Limited na a director nke
